Notes:
- This repository only ingests a curated subset of audio files needed for Build A (single neutral ambient loop).
- Original file: "676787__neartheatmoshphere__blinking-forest-acoustic.wav"
- Renamed to: "ambient_loop.wav" for Build A contract
- Normalized to the game's volume expectations (0.4 baseline)
- Used for: Background ambient atmosphere (single neutral loop for Build A)
